enableAsCollateral(CoreLibrary.ReserveDa.details: enables a reserve to be used as collateral

params._baseLTVasCollateral: the loan to value of the asset when used as collateral
params._liquidationBonus: the bonus liquidators receive to liquidate this asset*
params._liquidationThreshold: the threshold at which loans using this asset as collateral will be considered undercollateralized

params._stableBorrowRateEnabled: true if the stable borrow rate must be enabled by default, false otherwise*

params._aTokenAddress: the address of the overlying atoken contract
params._decimals: the number of decimals of the underlying asset
params._interestRateStrategyAddress: the address of the interest rate strategy contract*

userdoc.notice: Defines the data structures of the reserves and the user data*
